conclusion: Consider the forces acting on the system to find the frictional force exerted by the ground on the board.
The wooden block P slides on the long wooden board ab.
The frictional force on block P is F_f = μ2 * m * g.
The board remains stationary, so the frictional force by the ground must balance the frictional force by block P.
The frictional force by the ground on the board is F_g = μ1 * M * g.
F_f = F_g because the board is stationary.
Substitute expressions: μ2 * m * g = μ1 * M * g.
Simplify to get μ2 * m = μ1 * M.
The magnitude of the frictional force exerted by the ground is μ1 * M * g.
